title: Transfer All Address Book Contacts
content:
I would like to share all my contacts in my Address book. When I click on Export, Thunderbird exports my profile and address book into one file. This file is unreadable by others. All I want to do is share all my contacts.

Darryl
creator: dcady

title: CAN NOT FIND FOLDER AND MAIL
content: 수신한 메일을 폴더로 옮기는 중,에러가 발생하여 다른 폴더와 함께 메일이 없어졌습니다,해당 폴더에 보관된 메일들은 수신한 이력은 남아 있으나 메일 내용 확인이 불가능합니다 사라진 폴더는 메일시스템에서 찾아볼수 없습니다 어떻게 해결해야 할까요?
creator: seunghuii299

title: Block certain websites
content: Is it possible to block certain email address and other websites to prevent incessant junk mail.
creator: bulldogs2012

title: Cannot move new email account inbox
content: Hi, thanks in advance! I have several email addresses set up in Thunderbird. The incoming emails for all come into the global inbox with each having its own folder within that inbox. Today, I added a new email account and the folders for this account, including the inbox, are all in a separate folder. I cannot move the inbox up so it's in that global inbox with all of the others. I've searched for answers, but can't find one that works.
creator: chrisfallsupward
